kpi.name: M1022C198

kpi_info.title: SWI HS-DSCH/DCH TO DCH/DCH FOR STREAMING
kpi_info.use: The number of packet call channel switches from the HS-DSCH/DCH to the DCH/DCH (xx/yy) for the streaming traffic class. UPDATED: When the user's HS-DSCH/DCH user plane allocation is switched to the DCH/DCH (xx/yy).

kpi.kpi_alias: SWI HS-DSCH/DCH TO DCH/DCH FOR STREAMING
